description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Little Kingdom is a simulation game. You're the leader of a small kingdom aiming to conquer the world. In this peaceful world without war or battle. Strengthen your economy and dominate the world with your influence.  Choose your map, choose your teammate, and choose the AI levels!  Little Kingdom is playable up to 4 players on the same screen. (without spliscreen)
description.short: Little Kingdom is a simulation game. You're the leader of a small kingdom aiming to conquer the world. In this peaceful world without war or battle. Strengthen your economy and dominate the world with your influence.  Choose your map, choose your teammate, and choose the AI levels!  Little Kingdom is playable up to 4 players on the same screen. (without spliscreen)
